answers.answer: I am overweight also.When I went in for my first ob appointment at 11 weeks (I had been released from the fertility clinic at 9 weeks), I was told that due to my weight, I SHOULD NOT gain the normal 20-30 lbs in pregnancy weight.  When I went in for my 16 week checkup earlier today, I had only gained 1lb & the dr said "good, you only gained 1lb".

How are you guys not gaining any weight? What are you doing to help out? I am overweight and I think I have gained about 7 pounds already and I am just 6wks--I have morning sickness all day long and dont eat like I usually did at all--I dont know what I am doing wrong--Any suggestions would help.
well, i am 18 1/2 weeks preg and have gained about 16 pounds and was sick most of the first trimester. however i look like i've gained about 40 pounds, any coments about that?melonie

Im 11 weeks pregnant. I went to see my midwife on Tuesday and compared to my last visit I have lost weight, but I cant do my jeans up and my stomach is sticking out a bit. I seem to eat all the time. We think the reason for the weight loss is because Ive just stopped skating and its muscle that Ive lost. I did this with my last two also. I think as long as you are putting weight on even just a little and you eat well there should be know problem. The baby takes what it needs and we are the ones to miss out. Thats what I understand. Also because when you are pregnant you seem watch what you eat and that can make a difference also.

I initially gained about 5 lbs. I believe mostly due to water. Since I have been wieghed the first time at the ob's office I have lost 2lb. I think it iss because I am trying to eat only good foods. I have to worry about getting gestational diabetes again. So I am more aware of what I am eating. I only drink water or milk most of the time. I dont eat sausage or bacon for breakfast with my eggs. Just small stuff like that. And I try to stay away from fast food...

I gained 75 pounds with my first pregnancy--I cant afford to do that with this one--I am much older and already overweight--but I guess my metobolism is so slow because I have been eating good foods--fruits and veggies and all that and I still am steadily gaining weight--I want to walk but with the MS I am having I just dont have the energy right now--I dont know what to do to avoid it.

question: I am 12weeks pregnant and was curious as to what my weight gain should be?  I have gained maybe 1lb through the last 12weeks.  But I am overweight and when I found out I cut back on a lot of things such as soda(empty calories), high fat foods and went for the more fruit and veggie thing.  Do you think that maybe this is why my weight gain has not been signifigant?  I was also unable to eat alot until this past week.I am a bit worried that something may be wrong.Chasity
title: weight gain during pregnacy
